maqras.text: 36|28|Ami te'omra (mrtyura) pichata te'omra sampradayara biraud'dhe akasara paraa kono bahini praerana karaa na'i arau seya praerana karaara kono prayojano nachila.
36|29|Seya achila kerala eta bikata sabda. Phalata sihamta nithara nistabda hai ga’la.
36|30|Paraitapa bandasakalara babe; sihamtara ocarata yetiya'i kono raachula ahiche tetiya sihamte te'omra lagata thatta-bidraupa karaiche.
36|31|Sihamte laksya karaa na'ine ye, ami sihamtara purbe bahu prajanmaka dhbansa karaicho? Niscaya sihamta sihamtara ocarata ubhati nahiba.
36|32|Sihamta sakaloke ekatraita karai amara ocarata upasthita karaoraa ha’ba.
36|33|Arau mrta bhumi sihamtara babe eta nidarsana, yaka ami sanjiraita karaicho arau tara paraa sasya utpanna karaicho, yibora sihamte khaya.
36|34|Arau tata ami srsti karaicho khejura arau anurara udyana arau tata ami prabahita karaicho kichumana prasrarana
36|35|yate sihamte tara phalamula khaba parae, athaca sihamte nija haterae srsti karaa na'i. Tathapi'o sihamte krtajnata prakasa nakaraibane

36|36|paraitra arau mahana te'om, yijane sakaloke yora yorakai srsti karaiche, matira paraa utpanna udbhide'i ha'omka ba sihamtara nija prajatirae'i ha'omka (narai arau purausa) arau se'ibora bastura majato yiboraka sihamte najane.
36|37|Arau raati'o sihamtara babe eta nidarsana, ami tara paraa dinaka apasaraita karao, tetiya sihamta andhakaraacchanna hai parae.
36|38|Arau surya'i bhramana karae tara nirdista gantabyara phale, e'ito mahaparaakramasali, sarbajna (allaha)ra nirdharana.
36|39|Arau candrara babe ami nirdista karaicho bibhinna manajila, arasesata se'ito sukana beka, purani khejura thanira akarata ubhati yaya.
36|40|Suryara pakse sambhara nahaya candraka laga poraa, arau raatira pakse sambhara nahaya dinaka atikrama karaa, arau pratyeke'i nija nija kaksapathata samturai ache.
36|41|Sihamtara babe arau eta nidarsana haiche e'i ye, ami sihamtara bansadharabilakaka boja'i nauyanata araohana karaichilo
36|42|arau sihamtara babe'o anuraupa yanabahana srsti karaicho yate sihamte araohana karae.
36|43|Arau ami iccha karaile sihamtaka duba'i maraiba parao, tetiya sihamtara kono ud'dharakarai nathakiba arau sihamte paraitraano napaba
36|44|ekamatra amara karauna'ihe sihamtaka para laga'i diye arau kichu samayara babe upabhogara suyoga diya haya.
36|45|Arau yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘tomalokara sanmukhata yi ache arau tomalokara pichata yi ache se'i samparke takbaraa aralambana karaa; yate tomalokara prati rahamata karaa haya’
36|46|arau yetiya'i sihamtara pratipalakara nidarsanasamuhara majara paraa kono nidarsana sihamtara ocarata ahe, tetiya'i sihamte tara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya.

36|47|Arau yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘allahe tomalokaka yi jiraika dana karaiche tara paraa tomaloke byaya karaa’, tetiya kaphirasakale muminasakalaka kaya, ‘ami taka khadya dana karaimane, yaka allahe iccha karaile'i khoraaba parae? Niscaya tomaloka spasta bibhraantita acha’.
36|48|Sihamte kaya, ‘tomaloke yadi satyabadi horaa tente koraa, e'i pratisrauti ketiya purna ha’ba’
36|49|sihamta mathona eta bikata sabdara apeksata ache, yitorae sihamtaka baka-bitandata lipta thaka arasthata akramana karaiba.
36|50|Tetiya sihamte achiyata karaarao samartha napaba arau nijara paraiyalabargara ocaralaike'o ubhati ahiba noraaraiba.
36|51|Arau yetiya sinata phum diya ha’ba, tetiya'i sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i nija pratipalakara pine daurai guci ahiba.
36|52|Sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya! Durbhagya amara! Kone amaka amara nidraasthalara paraa uthale? Dayamaya allahe iyarae'i pratisrauti dichila arau raachulasakale'o satyahe kaichila’.
36|53|E'ito ha’ba kerala eta bikata sabda; tetiya'i ihamta sakaloke upasthita karaa ha’ba amara sanmukhata
36|54|eteke aji karao prati an'yaya karaa nahaba arau tomaloke yi karaichila kerala tarae'i pratiphala diya ha’ba.
36|55|Niscaya jannatabasisakala aji anandata magna thakiba
36|56|te'omloke arau te'omlokara straisakala susitala chamra talata susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba.
36|57|Tata thakiba te'omlokara babe phalamula, arau te'omloke yito bicaraiba se'itorae'i paba
36|58|asima dayalu pratipalakara taraphara paraa koraa ha’ba ‘chalama’ (abhinandana ba niraapatta).
36|59|Arau ‘he aparaadhisakala! Tomaloke aji prthaka hai yoraa’.
